title: Brett Kavanaugh Faces Sexual Assault Allegations | Eli Saslow & Derek Black
itunes:title: Brett Kavanaugh Faces Sexual Assault Allegations | Eli Saslow & Derek Black
description:
Stormy Daniels likens Donald Trump's penis to Toad from "Mario Kart," Brett Kavanaugh is accused of sexual assault, and Eli Saslow and Derek Black talk "Rising Out of Hatred."
